GP12brndp3_u:6161: sthalī ca padmarāgaḍhyā gopurādyaṃ ca tanmayam /
GP12brndp3_u:6167: bhartṛbhiḥ sahacāriṇyaḥ pibanti madhuraṃ madhu // BndP_3,33.13 //
GP12brndp3_u:6180: urvaśī menakā caiva rambhā cālaṃbuṣā tathā // BndP_3,33.18 //
GP12brndp3_u:6182: kṛtasthalā ca viśvācī puñjikasthalayā saha // BndP_3,33.19 //
GP12brndp3_u:6184: gandharvaiḥ saha navyāni kalpavṛkṣama dhūni ca // BndP_3,33.20 //
GP12brndp3_u:6189: agastya uvāca caturdaśāpi janmāni tāsāmapsarasāṃ vibho /
GP12brndp3_u:6191: hayagrīva uvāca brāhmaṇo hṛdayaṃ kāmo mṛtyururvī ca mārutaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6193: saudāminī ca pīyūṣaṃ dakṣakanyā jalaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:6196: etāḥ samastā gandharvaiḥ sārdhamarcanti cakriṇīm // BndP_3,33.26 //
GP12brndp3_u:6201: tatraiva hīrakakṣoṇyāṃ vajrā nāma nadī mune /
GP12brndp3_u:6204: sadā vahati sā siṃdhuḥ paritastatra pāvanī // BndP_3,33.30 //
GP12brndp3_u:6209: tarayāstīre tapastepe vajreśīṃ prati bhaktimān // BndP_3,33.32 //
GP12brndp3_u:6214: sthālī ca tatra vaidṛryanirmitā bhāsvarākṛtiḥ // BndP_3,33.34 //
GP12brndp3_u:6221: gaṇastatra tathā nāgaiḥ sārdhaṃ vasati sāṃganāḥ // BndP_3,33.37 //
GP12brndp3_u:6227: teṣu krīḍanti te nāgā asurāśca sahāṅganāḥ // BndP_3,33.40 //
GP12brndp3_u:6231: tatra nadyaśca madhurāḥ sarāṃsi śiśirāṇi ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6234: te dehānte śakranīlakakṣyāṃ prāpya vasaṃti vai // BndP_3,33.43 //
GP12brndp3_u:6236: pibanto madhuraṃ madyaṃ nṛtyanto bhaktinirbharāḥ // BndP_3,33.44 //
GP12brndp3_u:6245: nīlairbhāvaiḥ sadā yuktā vartante manujā mune // BndP_3,33.48 //
GP12brndp3_u:6247: te mune vismayāviṣṭāḥ saṃviśanti maheśvarīm // BndP_3,33.49 //
GP12brndp3_u:6269: kālasūtre raurave ca kumbhīpāke ca kumbhaja // BndP_3,33.60 //
GP12brndp3_u:6273: pātayatyājñayā tasyāḥ śrīdevyāḥ sa mahaujasaḥ // BndP_3,33.62 //
GP12brndp3_u:6277: vāruṇaṃ lokamāśritya varuṇe vartate sadā // BndP_3,33.64 //
GP12brndp3_u:6288: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā tasya śaktayaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6293: sa māruteśvaraḥ śrīmānsadā japati cakriṇīm // BndP_3,33.72 //
GP12brndp3_u:6325: ye rudrā adhibhūmyāṃ tu sahasrāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ // BndP_3,33.88 //
GP12brndp3_u:6329: arṇave cāntarikṣe ca vartamānā mahaujasaḥ // BndP_3,33.90 //
GP12brndp3_u:6332: ye anneṣu vividhyanti pātreṣu pibato janān /
GP12brndp3_u:6333: ye pathāṃ rathakā rudrā ye ca tīrthanivāsinaḥ // BndP_3,33.92 //
GP12brndp3_u:6342: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne puṣparāgaprakārādibhuktākarāntasaptakakṣāntarakathanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp3_u:6343: agastya uvāca ṣoḍaśāvaraṇaṃ cakraṃ kiṃ tadrudrādhidaivatam /
GP12brndp3_u:6344: tatra sthitāśca rudrāḥ ke kena nāmnā prakīrtitāḥ // BndP_3,34.1 //
GP12brndp3_u:6346: yaugikaṃ rauḍhikaṃ nāma teṣāṃ brūhi kṛpānidhe // BndP_3,34.2 //
GP12brndp3_u:6347: hayagrīva uvāca tatra rudrā layaḥ prokto muktājālakanirmitaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6352: trikoṇe kathitā rudrāstraya eva ghaṭodbhava // BndP_3,34.5 //
GP12brndp3_u:6359: daśāpatre tvāvaraṇe prathamo jagatāṃ patiḥ // BndP_3,34.9 //
GP12brndp3_u:6361: ahaṃ tvanyo vanapatī rohitaḥ sthapatistathā // BndP_3,34.10 //
GP12brndp3_u:6363: mantrī ca vāṇijaścaiva tathā kakṣapatiḥ paraḥ // BndP_3,34.11 //
GP12brndp3_u:6367: kṛtsnavītaśca dhāvaṃśca sattvānāṃ patireva ca // BndP_3,34.13 //
GP12brndp3_u:6370: kakubhaśca niṣaṅgī ca stenānāṃ ca patistathā /
GP12brndp3_u:6372: adhaḥ paricaro 'raṇyaḥ patiḥ kiṃ ca sṛkāviṣaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6373: jighāṃsaṃto muṣṇatāṃ ca patayaḥ kuṃbhasaṃbhava // BndP_3,34.16 //
GP12brndp3_u:6375: prakṛtīnāṃ patiścaiva uṣṇīṣī ca gireścaraḥ // BndP_3,34.17 //
GP12brndp3_u:6380: āsīnāśca śayānāśca yanto jāgrata eva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6388: rathāśca rathapattyākhyāḥ senāḥ senānya eva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6392: dhanvakārā mṛgayavaḥ śvanayaḥ śvāna eva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6397: mīḍhuṣṭama iti proktā rudrā daśamaśālagāḥ // BndP_3,34.28 //
GP12brndp3_u:6399: bṛhaṃśca varṣīyāṃ ścaiva vṛddhaḥ samṛddhinā saha // BndP_3,34.29 //
GP12brndp3_u:6401: urmyāvasvanyarudrau ca srotasyo divya eva ca // BndP_3,34.30 //
GP12brndp3_u:6407: vanyaḥ kakṣyaḥ śravaścaiva tato 'nyastu pratiśravaḥ // BndP_3,34.33 //
GP12brndp3_u:6409: avabhindaśca varmī ca varūthī bilminā saha // BndP_3,34.34 //
GP12brndp3_u:6410: kavacī ca śrutaścaiva seno dundubhya eva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6411: āhananyaśca dhṛṣṇuśca te ca ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6415: svāyudhaśca sudhanvā ca stutyaḥ pathyaśca kuṃbhaja /
GP12brndp3_u:6416: kāpyo nāḍhyastathā sūdhaḥ sarasyo vindhyamardana // BndP_3,34.37 //
GP12brndp3_u:6417: tataścānyo nādhamāno veśantaḥ kupya eva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6418: avadhavarṣyo 'varṣyaśca medhyo vidyutya eva ca // BndP_3,34.38 //
GP12brndp3_u:6424: hantā caiva hanīyāṃśca vṛṣaśca harikeśakaḥ // BndP_3,34.41 //
GP12brndp3_u:6428: ātaryaśca tathā labhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ phenyastathaiva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6432: kapardī ca pulastyaṃśca goṣṭhyo gṛhyastathaiva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6433: talpayo gehya stathā kāṭyo gahvareṣṭhorudīpakaḥ // BndP_3,34.45 //
GP12brndp3_u:6434: niveṣṭyaścāpi pāntavyo rathanyaḥ śukya eva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6435: harītyalothā lopyāśca uryyasūrmyai tathā mune // BndP_3,34.46 //
GP12brndp3_u:6439: vartate sāyudhāḥ prājña nityaṃ pañcādaśāvṛtau // BndP_3,34.48 //
GP12brndp3_u:6443: iti ṣoḍaśaśāleṣu sthitai rudraiḥ sahasraśaḥ // BndP_3,34.50 //
GP12brndp3_u:6458: sarvāḥ sthalyo marakataśreṇibhiḥ khacitāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_3,34.57 //
GP12brndp3_u:6466: vartante daṇḍanāthāyāḥ prītyarthaṃ śilpibhiḥ kṛtāḥ // BndP_3,34.61 //
GP12brndp3_u:6491: caturghā daśadhā caiva tathā dvādaśadhā punaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6492: vibhinnamūrtiḥ satataṃ vartate mādhavaḥ sadā // BndP_3,34.72 //
GP12brndp3_u:6502: govindo dakṣiṇe pārśve dhanvī candraprabho mahān // BndP_3,34.77 //
GP12brndp3_u:6506: vāyavyāṃ vāmano vajrī taruṇāditya dīptimān // BndP_3,34.79 //
GP12brndp3_u:6508: vidyutprabho hṛṣīkeśo hyavācyāṃ diśi mudgarī // BndP_3,34.80 //
GP12brndp3_u:6522: tādṛśāḥ paṅktayo bahvyaḥ stambhānāṃ tu caturdiśam // BndP_3,34.87 //
GP12brndp3_u:6538: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastya saṃvāde lalitopākhyāne dikpālādiśivalokāntarakathanaṃ nā catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp3_u:6539: hayagrīva uvāca atha vāpītra yādīnāṃ kakṣyābhedānpracakṣmahe /
GP12brndp3_u:6546: bhavanti puruṣāḥ prājñāstadeva hi rasāyanam // BndP_3,35.4 //
GP12brndp3_u:6552: caturyojanadūraṃ tu talaṃ tasyā jalāntare // BndP_3,35.7 //
GP12brndp3_u:6569: muhurgāyanti nṛtyanti devyāḥ puṇyatamaṃ yaśaḥ // BndP_3,35.15 //
GP12brndp3_u:6575: trinetrasyāpi no datte vāpikāṃbhasi santaram // BndP_3,35.18 //
GP12brndp3_u:6587: tanvānā satataṃ tārā kakṣyāmenāṃ hi rakṣati // BndP_3,35.24 //
GP12brndp3_u:6604: pakvaṃ piśitakhaṇḍaṃ ca maṇipātre tathānyake // BndP_3,35.32 //
GP12brndp3_u:6629: te 'treva hi tapastaptvā lokabhāsakatāṃ gatāḥ // BndP_3,35.44 //
GP12brndp3_u:6638: lalitāyā maheśānyāḥ sadā vidyā hṛdā japan // BndP_3,35.48 //
GP12brndp3_u:6657: santi tasyaiva nikaṭe sā kakṣā tatpra pūritā // BndP_3,35.58 //
GP12brndp3_u:6665: upāsate sadā sattaṃ naukāsthaṃ kusumāyudham // BndP_3,35.62 //
GP12brndp3_u:6681: mahāpadmāṭavīṃ gantuṃ na ko 'pi bhavati kṣamaḥ // BndP_3,35.69 //
GP12brndp3_u:6689: śālāstu viṃśatiḥ proktāḥ pañcasaṃkhyādhikāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_3,35.73 //
GP12brndp3_u:6691: padmāṭavīsthalaṃ vakṣye sāvadhāno mune śṛṇu // BndP_3,35.74 //
GP12brndp3_u:6700: bahuśaḥ saṃti padmāni koḍīnāmapi koḍiśaḥ // BndP_3,35.78 //
GP12brndp3_u:6706: dhūmrārciḥpramukhā bhānti kalā daśa vibhāvasoḥ // BndP_3,35.81 //
GP12brndp3_u:6720: suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā // BndP_3,35.87 //
GP12brndp3_u:6724: vāsyamānaṃ sadā hṛdyaṃ śītalaṃ laghu nirmalam // BndP_3,35.89 //
GP12brndp3_u:6730: amṛtā mānadā pūṣṇā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭī ratirdhṛtiḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6731: śaśinī candrikā kāntirjyotsnā śrīḥ prītiraṅgadā // BndP_3,35.92 //
GP12brndp3_u:6732: pūrṇā pūrṇāmṛtā ceti kalāḥ pīyūṣa rociṣaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6735: jarā siddhiriti proktāḥ krīḍanti brahmaṇaḥ kalāḥ // BndP_3,35.94 //
GP12brndp3_u:6737: varadāhlādinī prītirdīrghā ceti hareḥ kalāḥ // BndP_3,35.95 //
GP12brndp3_u:6738: tīkṣṇā raudrī bhayā nidrā tandrā kṣutkrodhinī trapā /
GP12brndp3_u:6739: utkārī mṛtyurapyetā roddhryastatra sthitāḥ kālāḥ // BndP_3,35.96 //
GP12brndp3_u:6741: catasreva proktāstu śaṅkarasya kalā atha // BndP_3,35.97 //
GP12brndp3_u:6742: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca tridyā śāntistathaiva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6743: indirā dīpikā caiva recikā caiva mocikā // BndP_3,35.98 //
GP12brndp3_u:6744: parā sūkṣmā ca vindhyāre tathā sūkṣmāmṛtā kalā /
GP12brndp3_u:6746: etāṃ ṣoḍaśa saṃproktāstatra krīḍanti śaktayaḥ // BndP_3,35.99 //
GP12brndp3_u:6748: śaktirupeṇa khelanti tatra vidyāḥ sahasraśaḥ // BndP_3,35.100 //
GP12brndp3_u:6750: tadarghyamamṛtaṃ pītvā sadā mādyanti śaktayaḥ // BndP_3,35.101 //
GP12brndp3_u:6759: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne mahāpadmāṭavyārghyasthāpanakathanaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp3_u:6766: tatra hotrī mahādevī hotā kāmeśvaraḥ paraḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:6767: ubhau tau nityahotārau rakṣataḥ sakalaṃ jagat // BndP_3,36.4 //
GP12brndp3_u:6787: taptametattu gāyatrī taptaṃ syāda bhayaṅkaram // BndP_3,36.14 //
GP12brndp3_u:6809: tiraskaraṇikāṃbā ca tathānyā pañcamī parā // BndP_3,36.25 //
GP12brndp3_u:6837: yasya dvārāṇi catvāri krośārdhāyāmabhāñji ca // BndP_3,36.38 //
GP12brndp3_u:6838: krośārddhārddhaṃ ca vistāro dvārāṇāṃ kathito mune /
GP12brndp3_u:6858: antare bhedite jāte hastasaṃkhyā mayocyate // BndP_3,36.47 //
GP12brndp3_u:6864: aṇimā mahimā caiva laghimā garimā tathā // BndP_3,36.50 //
GP12brndp3_u:6865: īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca prākāmyaṃ muktireva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:6866: icchā prāptiḥ sarvakāmetyetāḥ siddhaya uttamāḥ // BndP_3,36.51 //
GP12brndp3_u:6870: etā aṣṭau siddhayastu bahvyo 'nyā yogisaṃmatāḥ // BndP_3,36.53 //
GP12brndp3_u:6880: brāhmī māheśvarī caiva kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:6887: mudrāntaramiti traidhaṃ tatra mudrāḥ kṛtālayāḥ // BndP_3,36.60 //
GP12brndp3_u:6889: khecarī bījayonyākhyā trikhaṇḍā daśamī punaḥ // BndP_3,36.61 //
GP12brndp3_u:6895: etasmiñchaktayo yāsu tā uktāḥ prakaṭābhidhāḥ // BndP_3,36.64 //
GP12brndp3_u:6920: rekhā veginyaṅkuśā ca mālinyaṣṭau ca śaktayaḥ // BndP_3,36.76 //
GP12brndp3_u:6923: suṃdarī nāma vijñeyā nāmnā guptatarāpi sā /
GP12brndp3_u:6929: caturdaśa vasaṃtyeva tāsāṃ nāmāni macchṛṇu // BndP_3,36.80 //
GP12brndp3_u:6939: koṭiśaḥ śaktayastatra tāsāṃ kiṅkaryya uddhṛtāḥ // BndP_3,36.85 //
GP12brndp3_u:6948: etā devyaḥ kalotkīrṇā yoginyo nāmataḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_3,36.89 //
GP12brndp3_u:6954: cakraṃ mahattaraṃ divyaṃ sarvajñādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // BndP_3,36.92 //
GP12brndp3_u:6963: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne cintāmaṇigṛhāntarakathanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp3_u:6974: pavargeṇa parisphītā ṣaṣṭhī tu jayinī matā /
GP12brndp3_u:6982: nāyikā svasya cakrasya siddhānāmnā prakīrtitā // BndP_3,37.9 //
GP12brndp3_u:6989: dhanurdvayaṃ ca vindhyāre nava puṇḍreṣu kalpitam /
GP12brndp3_u:6990: pāśadvayaṃ ca dīptābhaṃ catvāryastrāṇi kumbhaja // BndP_3,37.13 //
GP12brndp3_u:6996: vartante 'strāntare tatra teṣāṃ saṃkhyā tu koṭiśaḥ // BndP_3,37.16 //
GP12brndp3_u:6997: vajraśaktiḥ śataghnī ca bhuśuṇḍī musalaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:6998: kṛpāṇaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ caiva mudgaraṃ bhindipālakam // BndP_3,37.17 //
GP12brndp3_u:7003: dhiṣṇyaṃ tu samayeśīnāṃ sthānaṃ ca tisṛṇāṃ matam // BndP_3,37.19 //
GP12brndp3_u:7006: tisṛṇāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni kāmeśī prathamā matā /
GP12brndp3_u:7007: vajreśī bhagamālā ca tāḥ sevante sahasraśaḥ // BndP_3,37.21 //
GP12brndp3_u:7008: sarveṣāṃ darśanānāṃ ca yā devyo vividhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7013: kāmeśyādicaturthī sā nityānāṃ ṣoḍaśī matā // BndP_3,37.24 //
GP12brndp3_u:7021: sṛṣṭāḥ kāmaṃśadevena teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // BndP_3,37.28 //
GP12brndp3_u:7023: taiḥ sṛṣṭā bahavo lokārakṣārthaṃ pādukātmakāḥ // BndP_3,37.29 //
GP12brndp3_u:7029: nityāntaramiti proktaṃ nityāḥ pañcadaśātra vai // BndP_3,37.32 //
GP12brndp3_u:7030: atha kāmeśvarī nityā nityā ca bhagamālinī /
GP12brndp3_u:7031: nityaklinnā api tathā bheruṇḍā vahnivāsinī // BndP_3,37.33 //
GP12brndp3_u:7033: nityā nīlapatākā ca vijayā sarvamaṅgalā // BndP_3,37.34 //
GP12brndp3_u:7043: visṛṣṭibinducakre tu ṣoḍaśyā bhavanaṃ matam // BndP_3,37.39 //
GP12brndp3_u:7047: tasminhṛdayadevyādyāḥ śaktayaḥ saṃti vai mune // BndP_3,37.41 //
GP12brndp3_u:7048: hṛddevī ca śirodevī śikhādevī tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:7084: niyatiḥ kālarāgau ca kalā vidye ca māyayā /
GP12brndp3_u:7134: bhāsate sā bhagavatī pāpaghnī lalitāṃbikā // BndP_3,37.84 //
GP12brndp3_u:7136: yasyāḥ pūjāphalaṃ prāhuyasyā eva hi pūjanam // BndP_3,37.85 //
GP12brndp3_u:7140: yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha // BndP_3,37.87 //
GP12brndp3_u:7142: na pakṣapātānna snehānna mohādvā mayocyate // BndP_3,37.88 //
GP12brndp3_u:7144: maṣīpātrāṇi sarve 'pi sapta saṃtu mahārṇavāḥ // BndP_3,37.89 //
GP12brndp3_u:7148: sarve bṛhaspatisamā vaktāro yadi kuṃbhaja // BndP_3,37.91 //
GP12brndp3_u:7151: atha vā vṛttirakhilā niṣphalā tadguṇastutau // BndP_3,37.92 //
GP12brndp3_u:7157: madvāṇī varṇayiṣyantī kaṇṭha eva hriyā hatā // BndP_3,37.95 //
GP12brndp3_u:7159: manaso 'pi hi dūre tatsaubhāgyaṃ kenavarṇyate // BndP_3,37.96 //
GP12brndp3_u:7163: adhiṣṭhāya śrīnagaraṃ sadā rakṣati viṣṭapam // BndP_3,37.98 //
GP12brndp3_u:7165: na bhedako 'pi vinyāso nāmamātraṃ purāṃ bhidā // BndP_3,37.99 //
GP12brndp3_u:7167: vadanti śrīpurakathāṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim // BndP_3,37.100 //
GP12brndp3_u:7168: ākarṇayanti pṛcchanti vicinvanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7169: ye pustake dhārayanti te yānti paramāṃ gatim // BndP_3,37.101 //
GP12brndp3_u:7172: saṃpādayanti ye bhaktāste yānti paramāṃ gatim // BndP_3,37.102 //
GP12brndp3_u:7173: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne gṛharājāntarakathanaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp3_u:7178: hayagrīva uvāca sarvebhyo 'pi padārthebhyaḥ śābdaṃ vastu mahattaram /
GP12brndp3_u:7183: tebhyo gāṇapatā mantrā mune vīrya mahattarāḥ // BndP_3,38.5 //
GP12brndp3_u:7185: tebhyo 'pi lakṣmīmantrāstu tebhyaḥ sārasvatā varāḥ // BndP_3,38.6 //
GP12brndp3_u:7190: teṣu dvau manurājau tu variṣṭhau vindhyamardana /
GP12brndp3_u:7197: śivena śaktyā kāmena kṣityā caiva tu māyayā // BndP_3,38.12 //
GP12brndp3_u:7199: śakreṇa bhuvaneśena candreṇa ca manobhuvā // BndP_3,38.13 //
GP12brndp3_u:7203: ye yajanti mahābhāgāsteṣāṃ sarvatra siddhaye // BndP_3,38.15 //
GP12brndp3_u:7209: tatra śrīmadguruṃ dhvātvā prasannaṃ karuṇāmayam // BndP_3,38.18 //
GP12brndp3_u:7211: athāgatya ca tailena sāmodena vilepitaḥ // BndP_3,38.19 //
GP12brndp3_u:7215: paridhāya paṭau śuddhe kausumbhau vātha vāruṇau /
GP12brndp3_u:7256: sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ ca tāstāḥ siddhaya ujjvalāḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7272: darśanāni ca sarvāṇi kartu khaṇḍayituṃ paṭuḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7273: tattvañjānāti nikhilaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca gacchati // BndP_3,38.48 //
GP12brndp3_u:7288: kulaṃ jātiṃ ca śīlaṃ ca lajjāṃ ca parivārakam /
GP12brndp3_u:7292: yatra kutrāpi tiṣṭhantaṃ taṃ dhāvanti mṛgīdṛśaḥ // BndP_3,38.57 //
GP12brndp3_u:7294: tadvadbhramanti cittāni darśane tasya subhruvām // BndP_3,38.58 //
GP12brndp3_u:7296: taṃ sevante samastānāṃ vidyānāmapi paṅktayaḥ // BndP_3,38.59 //
GP12brndp3_u:7299: anyāsāṃ tu varākīṇāṃ vaktavyaṃ kiṃ tapodhana // BndP_3,38.60 //
GP12brndp3_u:7300: pattaneṣu ca vīthīṣu catvareṣu vaneṣu ca /
GP12brndp3_u:7302: tasya darśanataḥ pāpa jālaṃ naśyati pāpinām /
GP12brndp3_u:7303: tadguṇā eva ghokṣyante sarvatra kavipuṅgavaiḥ // BndP_3,38.62 //
GP12brndp3_u:7305: ye dhyāyanti mahādevīṃ tāstāḥ siddhīrbhañjati te // BndP_3,38.63 //
GP12brndp3_u:7315: nīlā ca mūkīkaraṇe pītā staṃbhanakarmaṇi // BndP_3,38.68 //
GP12brndp3_u:7319: ye dhyāyanti mahāpuñjaṃ te syuḥ saṃsiddhasiddhayaḥ // BndP_3,38.70 //
GP12brndp3_u:7324: tasya no paścimaṃ janma svayaṃ yo vā na śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7325: na tena labhyate vidyā lalitā parameśvarī // BndP_3,38.72 //
GP12brndp3_u:7326: vaṃśe tu yasya kasyāpi bhavedeṣa manuryadi /
GP12brndp3_u:7327: tadvaṃśyāḥ sarva eva syurmuktāstṛptā na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_3,38.73 //
GP12brndp3_u:7343: kāmākṣīti vidhātrā tu prastutā laliteśvarī // BndP_3,38.81 //
GP12brndp3_u:7344: dhyāyataḥ parayā bhaktyā tāṃ parāṃ lalitāṃbikām /
GP12brndp3_u:7365: hayagrīva uvāca rahasyaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi lopāmudrāpate śṛṇu // BndP_3,39.8 //
GP12brndp3_u:7369: dakṣahaste yogamudrāṃ vāmahaste tu pustakam // BndP_3,39.10 //
GP12brndp3_u:7384: padmāsane ca tiṣṭhantī viṣṇunā jiṣṇunā saha // BndP_3,39.18 //
GP12brndp3_u:7388: ādilakṣmīmiti khyātāṃ sarveṣāṃ hṛdaye sthitām // BndP_3,39.20 //
GP12brndp3_u:7399: yā karoti svasaṅkalpāttasyai devyai namonamaḥ // BndP_3,39.25 //
GP12brndp3_u:7402: nāgamaiśca na vedaiśca na śāstrairna ca yogibhiḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7403: dedyā yā ca svasaṃvedyā tasyai devyai namonamaḥ // BndP_3,39.27 //
GP12brndp3_u:7405: paraṃ brahmeti yā khyātā tasyaidṛ // BndP_3,39.28 //
GP12brndp3_u:7406: hṛdayasthāpi sarveṣāṃ yā na kenāpi dṛśyate /
GP12brndp3_u:7422: gururmantro devatā ca tathā prāṇāśca pañcadhā /
GP12brndp3_u:7425: śrīvidyeti smṛtā vā tu tasyaidṛ // BndP_3,39.38 //
GP12brndp3_u:7435: bhūyobhūyo namaskṛtya sahasā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // BndP_3,39.43 //
GP12brndp3_u:7436: santuṣṭā sā tadā devī brahmāṇaṃ prekṣya saṃnatam /
GP12brndp3_u:7441: karmabhūmau tu loke 'sminprāyo mūḍhā ime janāḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7443: tatheti tasya taṃ kāmaṃ pūrayāmāsa vedhasaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7444: atha dhātā punastasyā devyā vāsamakalpayat // BndP_3,39.47 //
GP12brndp3_u:7446: tatsāṃnidhyaṃ sadā kāñcyāṃ prārthayāmāsa cādṛtaḥ // BndP_3,39.48 //
GP12brndp3_u:7448: atha tuṣṭo jagaddhātā punaḥ prāha maheśvarīm // BndP_3,39.49 //
GP12brndp3_u:7456: atha śrīpuṇḍarīkākṣo brahmaṇā saha sādaram // BndP_3,39.53 //
GP12brndp3_u:7464: yā yāstu devatāḥ proktāstāḥ sarvāḥ parameśvarīm // BndP_3,39.57 //
GP12brndp3_u:7466: manasā nirmitaṃ dhātrā madhye nagaramadbhutam // BndP_3,39.58 //
GP12brndp3_u:7470: devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha // BndP_3,39.60 //
GP12brndp3_u:7472: ko vā varṇayituṃ śakto yadi jihvāsahasravān // BndP_3,39.61 //
GP12brndp3_u:7476: itthaṃ tā devatāstatra tisraḥ sannihitāḥ sadā // BndP_3,39.63 //
GP12brndp3_u:7477: tadā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatparau dampatī tu tau /
GP12brndp3_u:7483: kā nāma vāṇī mā nāma kamalā te ubhe tataḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7484: prādurbhūte prabhāpuñje pañjarānta iva sthite // BndP_3,39.67 //
GP12brndp3_u:7488: tisraḥ koṭyor'dhakoṭī ca yā yāstīr thādhidevatāḥ // BndP_3,39.69 //
GP12brndp3_u:7502: indirā ca mahālakṣmyā saṃdiṣṭā tuṣṭayā tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:7504: tadājñāṃ śirasā dhṛtvā ramā viṣṇuśca bhaktitaḥ // BndP_3,39.75 //
GP12brndp3_u:7511: tatra yāto mahāgauryāḥ pratibiṃbo manoharaḥ // BndP_3,39.78 //
GP12brndp3_u:7543: śivo viṣṇuśca tatratyāḥ samastāśca mahājanāḥ // BndP_3,39.94 //
GP12brndp3_u:7545: atha tarhi maheśānī svatantrā praviveśa ha // BndP_3,39.95 //
GP12brndp3_u:7547: bimbaṃ kṛtvātmanā bimbe saṃpraviśya sthitāṃ ca tām /
GP12brndp3_u:7548: dṛṣṭvā bhūyo namaskṛtya punaḥ prārthitavānvidhiḥ // BndP_3,39.96 //
GP12brndp3_u:7556: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaktito natvā prayāntu paramāṃ gatim // BndP_3,39.99 //
GP12brndp3_u:7560: tāṃ namaskṛtya te sarve tato jagamuryathāgatam // BndP_3,39.101 //
GP12brndp3_u:7562: sārdhaṃ śrīmandire tatra mantropetāṃ niveśya ca /
GP12brndp3_u:7563: ārādhya vaidikaiḥ stotraiḥ sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇanāma saḥ // BndP_3,39.102 //
GP12brndp3_u:7565: viṣṇuṃ śivaṃ ca svasthāne samādhāya samāhitaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7569: vāmabhāge vṛtaṃ lakṣyaṃ viṣṇunānyatra sevinam // BndP_3,39.106 //
GP12brndp3_u:7574: idānīṃ tvaṃ tadabhyarcya yadhāvidhi vidhe mudā /
GP12brndp3_u:7575: maṇḍalaṃ tvakhilaṃ kṛtvā nijalokaṃ hi pālaya // BndP_3,39.109 //
GP12brndp3_u:7577: nikṣipya hṛdi tāṃ devīṃ nijaṃ dhāma jagāma saḥ // BndP_3,39.110 //
GP12brndp3_u:7580: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ yaścāpi prayataḥ paṭhet /
GP12brndp3_u:7581: tasya bhuktiśca muktiśca karasthā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BndP_3,39.112 //
GP12brndp3_u:7584: tapasā toṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ mayā ca cirakālataḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7585: sārūpyamuktiṃ kṛpayā dattvā putrāya me prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7588: rahasyamantraṃ saṃvakṣyeśṛṇu taṃ tvaṃ samāhitaḥ // BndP_3,39.115 //
GP12brndp3_u:7589: na brahmā na ca viṣṇurvā na rudraśca trayo 'pyamī /
GP12brndp3_u:7591: sadāśivo na jānāti kathaṃ prākṛtadevatāḥ // BndP_3,39.116 //
GP12brndp3_u:7597: kaścidatra viśeṣo 'sti vaktavyāṃśo 'pi taṃ śṛṇu // BndP_3,39.119 //
GP12brndp3_u:7601: bhūya eva pravakṣyāmi sāvadhānamanāḥ śṛṇu // BndP_3,39.121 //
GP12brndp3_u:7602: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne ekonacatvāriṃśo
GP12brndp3_u:7607: etasyāścaritaṃ divyaṃ vada me vadatāṃ vara // BndP_3,40.2 //
GP12brndp3_u:7608: hayagrīva uvāca atra sthitāpi sarveṣāṃ hṛdayasthā ghaṭodbhava /
GP12brndp3_u:7609: tattatkarmānurūpaṃ sā pradatte dehināṃ phalam // BndP_3,40.3 //
GP12brndp3_u:7619: brahmāṇaṃ sarva lokānāṃ sṛṣṭikārye nyayuṅkta sā /
GP12brndp3_u:7620: vāsudevaṃ paritrāṇe saṃhāre ca trilocanam // BndP_3,40.8 //
GP12brndp3_u:7621: te sarve 'pi mahālakṣmīṃ dhyāyantaḥ śarmadāṃ sadā /
GP12brndp3_u:7622: brahmaloke ca vaikuṇṭhe kailāse ca vasaṃtyamī // BndP_3,40.9 //
GP12brndp3_u:7628: iti karttavyatāmūḍhā na prajānanta kiñcana // BndP_3,40.12 //
GP12brndp3_u:7630: tvayā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ devi mama netrapidhānataḥ // BndP_3,40.13 //
GP12brndp3_u:7632: sarvaṃ ca vaidikaṃ karma tvayā nāśitamaṃbike // BndP_3,40.14 //
GP12brndp3_u:7634: gatvā kāśīṃ vrataṃ tatra kiñcitkālaṃ samācara // BndP_3,40.15 //
GP12brndp3_u:7636: ārādhayaitāṃ nityāṃ tvaṃ sarvapāpaharīṃ śivām // BndP_3,40.16 //
GP12brndp3_u:7654: praṇipatya ca sāṣṭāṅgaṃ kṛtvā caiva pradakṣiṇām // BndP_3,40.25 //
GP12brndp3_u:7658: vatse labhasva bhartāraṃ rudraṃ svamanasepsitam // BndP_3,40.27 //
GP12brndp3_u:7660: ahaṃ tvamiti ko bhedastvamevāhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_3,40.28 //
GP12brndp3_u:7661: kiṃ pāpaṃ tava kalyāṇi tvaṃ hi pāpanikṛntanī /
GP12brndp3_u:7665: bhaktyā praṇamya paśyantī parāṃ prītimupāyayau // BndP_3,40.30 //
GP12brndp3_u:7667: praviṣṭā hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ prahṛṣṭāyā mahāmune // BndP_3,40.31 //
GP12brndp3_u:7669: svapnaḥ kimeṣa dṛṣṭo vā mayā kimatha vā bhramaḥ // BndP_3,40.32 //
GP12brndp3_u:7672: prasannavadanā sā tu praṇate vadati sma sā // BndP_3,40.33 //
GP12brndp3_u:7673: etāvantamalaṃ kālaṃ kutra yāte yuvāṃ priye /
GP12brndp3_u:7674: mayā dṛṣṭāṃ tu kāmākṣīṃ yuvāṃ cetkimapaśyatam // BndP_3,40.34 //
GP12brndp3_u:7678: na svapno na bhramo vāpi sākṣātte hṛdayaṃ gatā /
GP12brndp3_u:7683: acaṣṭa kṛpayā tuṣṭā dhyāyantaṃ niścalaṃ śivam // BndP_3,40.38 //
GP12brndp3_u:7685: aṅgīkuruṣva kandarpaṃ bhūyo macchāsane sthitam // BndP_3,40.39 //
GP12brndp3_u:7690: ityuktvāntardadhe tasya hṛdaye paramā ramā // BndP_3,40.41 //
GP12brndp3_u:7694: yadvilāsātsamutpannaṃ layaṃ yāti ca yatra vai // BndP_3,40.43 //
GP12brndp3_u:7700: ādilakṣmyāḥ prabhāvaṃ tu kathayāmi tavānagha // BndP_3,40.46 //
GP12brndp3_u:7702: dikpālāśca surāḥ sarve sanakādyāśca yoginaḥ // BndP_3,40.47 //
GP12brndp3_u:7705: dvayoḥ pañcamukhatvena bhedaṃ na vividustadā // BndP_3,40.48 //
GP12brndp3_u:7707: teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ madhye kṣipramantarhitaḥ śivaḥ // BndP_3,40.49 //
GP12brndp3_u:7712: tvaṃ ca rudraśca me putrau sṛṣṭikarturubhau yuvām // BndP_3,40.51 //
GP12brndp3_u:7725: hāheti tatra sarve 'pi krandantaśca palāyitāḥ // BndP_3,40.56 //
GP12brndp3_u:7726: atha brahmakapālaṃ tu nakhalagnaṃ sa bhairavaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7727: bhūyobhūyo dhunoti sma tathāpi na mumoca tam // BndP_3,40.57 //
GP12brndp3_u:7738: uttare sevituṃ lakṣmyā vāsudevena dakṣiṇe // BndP_3,40.62 //
GP12brndp3_u:7745: na brahmā naiva viṣṇurvā na siddhaḥ kapilo 'pi vā // BndP_3,40.65 //
GP12brndp3_u:7746: nānye ca sanakādyā ye munayo vā śukādayaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7747: tayā samādhiniṣṭhāyāṃ na samarthāḥ kathañcana // BndP_3,40.66 //
GP12brndp3_u:7750: ardharātre puraḥ sthitvā vācaṃ provāca vāṅmayī // BndP_3,40.67 //
GP12brndp3_u:7751: śrīkaṇṭha sarvapāpaghna kiṃ pāpaṃ tava vidyate /
GP12brndp3_u:7752: madrūpastvaṃ kathaṃ dehaḥ seyaṃ lokaviḍambanā // BndP_3,40.68 //
GP12brndp3_u:7758: punaḥ punardhūnute sma karalagnaṃ kapālakam // BndP_3,40.71 //
GP12brndp3_u:7759: tathāpi tattu nāsraṃsatsa nirvedaṃ paraṃ gataḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7760: svapnaḥ kimeṣa māyā vā mānasabhrāntireva vā // BndP_3,40.72 //
GP12brndp3_u:7762: svayameva nigṛhyātha śokaṃ dhīrāgraṇīḥ śivaḥ // BndP_3,40.73 //
GP12brndp3_u:7766: alaṃ samādhinā śambho nimajjātra sarovare // BndP_3,40.75 //
GP12brndp3_u:7768: iyaṃ ca māyā svapno vā kiṃ karttavyaṃ mayātha vā // BndP_3,40.76 //
GP12brndp3_u:7772: bhagavānvyo mavāṇyā tu nimajjāpsviti garjitam // BndP_3,40.78 //
GP12brndp3_u:7773: śrutvā śaṅkāṃ samutsṛjya tattvaṃ niścitya śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:7774: nimamajja sarasyāṃ tu gaṅgāyāṃ punarutthitaḥ // BndP_3,40.79 //
GP12brndp3_u:7778: bhikṣārthaṃ nagarīmenāṃ praviveśa vaśī śivaḥ // BndP_3,40.81 //
GP12brndp3_u:7781: bhikṣāṃ jyotirmayīṃ tasmai dattvā kṣipraṃ tirodadhe /
GP12brndp3_u:7784: prasannavadanāṃbhojo bahu mene muhuḥ param // BndP_3,40.84 //
GP12brndp3_u:7785: purī kāñcī purī puṇyā nadī kaṃpā nadī parā /
GP12brndp3_u:7790: prabhāvaṃ śrīmahādevyāḥ kāmadaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // BndP_3,40.87 //
GP12brndp3_u:7798: vaśiṣṭha uvāca mama vaṃśa mahārāja rahasyaṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12brndp3_u:7799: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī hyavantikā /
GP12brndp3_u:7813: arcayāmāsa rājendro bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ // BndP_3,40.97 //
GP12brndp3_u:7823: tādṛśāṃ karmaṇāṃ śāntyai gatvā kāñcīpuraṃ varam /
GP12brndp3_u:7824: snātvā kampāsarasyāṃ ca tatra māṃ paśya pāvanīm // BndP_3,40.102 //
GP12brndp3_u:7834: mahālakṣmīsvarūpeṇa kiṃ vā kṛtyātmanā sthitā // BndP_3,40.107 //
GP12brndp3_u:7838: kudehaśca kubhāvaśca nāstikatvaṃ layaṃ vrajet // BndP_3,40.109 //
GP12brndp3_u:7846: tatsamā karṇya sā devī santoṣamabhajattadā // BndP_3,40.113 //
GP12brndp3_u:7849: snātvā kaṃpātaraṅgiṇyāṃ dṛṣṭvā devīṃ ca pāvanīm /
GP12brndp3_u:7850: pañcatīrthe tataḥ snātvā devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ // BndP_3,40.115 //
GP12brndp3_u:7858: praṇipatya tu sāṣṭāṅgaṃ bhāryayā saha bhaktimān // BndP_3,40.119 //
GP12brndp3_u:7862: tatra svaguruṇoktaṃ ca kṛtvā svātmārghapūjanam // BndP_3,40.121 //

GP12brndp3_u:8395: gaṇako 'nāmayā jñeyaḥ kālyā nartaka iṣyate // BndP_3,44.45 //
GP12brndp3_u:8414: pūrṇodarī ca virajā tṛtīyā śālma tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8415: lolākṣī vartulākṣī ca dīrghaṅghoṇā tathaiva ca // BndP_3,44.55 //
GP12brndp3_u:8417: kuñjarī caurdhvakeśā ca dvimukhī vikṛtānanā // BndP_3,44.56 //
GP12brndp3_u:8421: laṃbodarī bhūtamatā drāviṇī nāgarī tathā // BndP_3,44.58 //
GP12brndp3_u:8422: khecarī mañjarī caiva rūpiṇī vīriṇī tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8423: koṭarā pūtanā bhadrā kālī yoginya eva ca // BndP_3,44.59 //
GP12brndp3_u:8425: kapardinī tathā vajrā jayā ca sumukheśvarī // BndP_3,44.60 //
GP12brndp3_u:8426: revatī mādhavī caiva vāruṇī vāyavī tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8427: rakṣāvadhāriṇī cānyā tathā ca sahajāhvayā // BndP_3,44.61 //
GP12brndp3_u:8429: dviruktavālāyā varṇai raṅgaṃ kṛtvātha kevalaiḥ // BndP_3,44.62 //
GP12brndp3_u:8441: ekapādo dvipādaśca śūro vīraśca ṣaṇmukhaḥ // BndP_3,44.68 //
GP12brndp3_u:8444: jaṭī muṇḍī tathā khaḍgī vareṇyo vṛṣaketanaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:8447: śrīśca hrīścaiva puṣṭiśca śāntistuṣṭiḥ sarasvatī // BndP_3,44.71 //
GP12brndp3_u:8448: ratirmedhā tathā kāntiḥ kāminī mohinī tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8449: tīvrā ca jvālinī nandā suyaśāḥ kāmarūpiṇī // BndP_3,44.72 //
GP12brndp3_u:8451: kāmārttā madajihvā ca vikaṭā ghūrṇitānanā // BndP_3,44.73 //
GP12brndp3_u:8455: lolākṣī capalā ṛjvī durbhagā subhagā śivā // BndP_3,44.75 //
GP12brndp3_u:8456: durgā guhapriyā kālī kālajihvā ca śaktayaḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:8461: hṛdayādho raviṃ nyasya śīrṣṇi somaṃ dṛśoḥ kujam // BndP_3,44.78 //
GP12brndp3_u:8462: hṛdi śukraṃ ca hṛnmadhye budhaṃ kaṇṭhe bṛhaspatim /
GP12brndp3_u:8463: nābhau śanaiścaraṃ vaktre rāhuṃ ketuṃ padadvaye // BndP_3,44.79 //
GP12brndp3_u:8470: nābhau svādhiṣṭhite mūle bhrūmadhye mūrdhani kramāt /
GP12brndp3_u:8472: dalāgreṣu tu padmasya mūrdhni sarvāśca vinyaset /
GP12brndp3_u:8473: amṛtā nandinīndrāṇī tvīśānī cātyumā tathā // BndP_3,44.84 //
GP12brndp3_u:8477: kālikā khecarī gāyatrī ghaṇṭādhāriṇī tathā // BndP_3,44.86 //
GP12brndp3_u:8478: nādātmikā ca cāmuṇṭā chatrikā ca jayā tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8479: jhaṅkāriṇī ca saṃjñā ca ṭaṅkahastā tataḥ param // BndP_3,44.87 //
GP12brndp3_u:8480: ṭaṅkāriṇī ca vijñeyāḥ śaktayo dvādaśa kramāt /
GP12brndp3_u:8481: ḍaṅkārī ṭaṅkāriṇī ca ṇāminī tāmasī tathā // BndP_3,44.88 //
GP12brndp3_u:8482: thaṅkāriṇī dayā dhātrī nādinī pārvatī tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8483: phaṭkāriṇī ca vijñeyāḥ śaktayo dvayapannagāḥ // BndP_3,44.89 //
GP12brndp3_u:8484: vardhinī ca tathā bhadrā majjā caiva yaśasvinī /
GP12brndp3_u:8485: ramā ca lāminī ceti ṣaḍetāḥ śaktayaḥ kramāt // BndP_3,44.90 //
GP12brndp3_u:8487: catasro 'pi tathaiva dve hākinī ca kṣamā tathā // BndP_3,44.91 //
GP12brndp3_u:8488: tataḥ pāde ca liṅge ca kukṣau hṛddoḥśirasmu ca /
GP12brndp3_u:8490: tataḥ pīṭhāni pañcāśadekaṃ cakraṃ mano nyaset /
GP12brndp3_u:8495: śrīpīṭhaṃ caikavīrāṃ ca jālandhraṃ mālavaṃ tathā // BndP_3,44.95 //
GP12brndp3_u:8497: aṭṭahāsaṃ ca virajaṃ rājaveśma mahāpatham // BndP_3,44.96 //
GP12brndp3_u:8499: ujjyinyapi citrā ca kṣīrakaṃ hastināpuram // BndP_3,44.97 //
GP12brndp3_u:8500: uḍīrāṃ ca prayāgaṃ ca ṣaṣṭimāyāpuraṃ tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8501: gaurīśaṃ salayaṃ caiva śrīśailaṃ marumeva ca // BndP_3,44.98 //
GP12brndp3_u:8509: tataḥ ṣoḍhā puraḥ kṛtvā śrīcakranyāsamācaret // BndP_3,44.102 //
GP12brndp3_u:8513: dakṣiṇorusamaṃ vāmaṃ sarvāṃśca kramaśo nyaset // BndP_3,44.104 //
GP12brndp3_u:8514: gaṇeśaṃ kṣetrapālaṃ ca yoginīṃ baṭukaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8520: aṇimā caiva laghimā tṛtīyā mahimā tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8521: īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca prākāmyaṃ prāptireva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:8526: brāhmī māheśvarī caiva kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8527: vārāhī ca tathendrāṇī cāmuṇḍā caiva saptamī // BndP_3,44.11 //
GP12brndp3_u:8528: mahālakṣmīśca vijñeyā mātaro vai kramād budhaiḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:8529: mudrādevīrnyasedaṣṭāveṣveva dve ca te punaḥ // BndP_3,44.12 //
GP12brndp3_u:8533: mahāṅkuśī ca sarvādyā sarvādyā khecarī tathā // BndP_3,44.14 //
GP12brndp3_u:8536: trailokya mohanaṃ cakraṃ samarpya vyāpya varṣmaṇi /
GP12brndp3_u:8537: tataḥ kalānāṃ nityānāṃ kramātṣoḍaśakaṃ nyaset // BndP_3,44.16 //
GP12brndp3_u:8547: dakṣahasta talasyātha pṛṣṭhaṃ tatsphikca jānunī // BndP_3,44.21 //
GP12brndp3_u:8549: cakreśīṃ nyasya cakraṃ ca samarcya vyāpya varṣmaṇi // BndP_3,44.22 //
GP12brndp3_u:8556: cakreśīṃ nyasya cakraṃ ca samarpya vyāpya varṣmaṇi /
GP12brndp3_u:8559: uparyadhaśca jaṅghāyāṃ tathā vāme vilomataḥ // BndP_3,44.27 //
GP12brndp3_u:8563: sarvādyā jṛṃbhiṇī śaktiḥ sarvādyā vaśakāriṇī // BndP_3,44.29 //
GP12brndp3_u:8567: cakreśīṃ nyasya cakraṃ ca samarpya vyāpya varṣmaṇi // BndP_3,44.31 //
GP12brndp3_u:8576: cakreśīṃ nyasya cakraṃ ca samarpya vyāpya varṣmaṇi /
GP12brndp3_u:8583: cakreśīṃ nyasya cakraṃ ca samarpya vyāpya varṣmaṇi /
GP12brndp3_u:8585: dakṣe tu cibuke kaṇṭhe stane nābhau ca pārśvayoḥ /
GP12brndp3_u:8586: vāmā vinodinī vidyā vaśitā kāmikī matā // BndP_3,44.140 //
GP12brndp3_u:8587: kāmeśvarī parā jñeyā mohinī vimalā tathā /
GP12brndp3_u:8589: kaulinīti samuktāni tāsāṃ nāmāni sūribhiḥ // BndP_3,44.41 //
GP12brndp3_u:8591: hṛdi trikoṇaṃ saṃbhāvya dikṣu prāgāditaḥ kramāt // BndP_3,44.42 //
GP12brndp3_u:8595: kāmeśvarī tathā nityā nityā ca bhagamālinī // BndP_3,44.44 //
GP12brndp3_u:8596: nityaklinnā tathā nityā nityā bheruṇḍinī matā /
GP12brndp3_u:8598: nityā ca dūtī nityā ca tvaritā tu tataḥ param /
GP12brndp3_u:8599: kulasundarikā nityā kulyā nityā tataḥ param // BndP_3,44.46 //
GP12brndp3_u:8600: nityā nīlapatākā ca nityā tu vijayā parā /
GP12brndp3_u:8601: tatastu maṅgalā caiva nityapūrvā pracakṣyate // BndP_3,44.47 //
GP12brndp3_u:8602: prabhāmālinikā nityā citrā nityā tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp3_u:8606: cakreśvarīṃ hṛdi nyasya kṛtvā cakraṃ samuddhṛtam /
GP12brndp3_u:8607: pradarśya mudrāṃ yonyākhyāṃ sarvānandamanuṃ japet // BndP_3,44.150 //
GP12brndp3_u:8609: iti śrībrahmāṇḍamahāpurāṇe uttarabhāge hayagrīvāgastyasaṃvāde lalitopākhyāne catuścatvāriṃśo
GP12brndp3_u:8612: saṃśodhitaṃ nikhilamānyapurāṇakaṃ yad brahmāṇḍasaṃjñamiha tadviduṣāṃ mude
GP12brndp3_u:8615: saṃśodhitamapi dayayā tatkṣantavyaṃ hyaśeṣeṇa oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya /
